channel.title: Starting Equipment
channel.description:
Ok, so i started off making my own source by using DefaultScape which is a source with hardly anything in it.
Anyways, i wanted to know how to change what you have in your inventory and what you equip when you make a new account.
If anyone could help me that'd be great[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2008, 03:47:11 am[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Starting Equipment
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

search: unique

then and then change the item id’s to what you want…

and by whats in you inventory do you mean when you type ::starter?

Read full topic
